sentences.sentence: Mammoth bones have also been found at some other Clovis sites.
sentences.translation: 在其他一些克洛维斯遗址也发现了猛犸象的骨头。

sentences.sentence: Any of them might conceal a mammoth graveyard or the next mummified Lyuba.
sentences.translation: 他们中的任何一个都可能隐藏着一个猛犸象墓地或下一个木乃伊一样的柳芭。

sentences.sentence: What he did was, he wrote a computer program to simulate what would happen to mammoth under certain conditions.
sentences.translation: 他所做的是写一个电脑程序来模拟在特定条件下猛犸象会发生什么。
